name: Addictionrecoveryaffirmations
0:
”Alexa open recovery thoughts”
”Alexa launch recovery thoughts”
”Alexa start recovery thoughts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: recovery thoughts
des:
This skill is meant to help those struggling with addictions as they try to remain clean and sober. This Alexa skill offers a random affirmation or message of support for the purpose of helping individuals on their path to recovery . 

No special hardware or accounts are needed for this skill which was built using the Fact Skills Template from the Alexa Skills Kit.

Disclaimer: This Alexa skill is not a substitute for consultation with a mental health or addictions counsellor. The affirmations in this skill are meant to encourage and build self esteem, but are not meant as a specific treatment in place of professional care.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
